r's chest...

turday, July 14, 2001 3:17 AM

ain/Clash


    Arrow was caught direct and very hard and a large gash open=
s up under his right eye. He puts his hand up to his face and sees he was c=
ut open. He then tried to slap Stiller's face in a rage...

      ----- Ori=
ginal Message -----

der attack... again/Clash


      STILLER





      (Stiller is punched di=
rectly in his left eye. He stumbles backwards but regains his balance. His =
vision in his left optic was now blurry. He blinks his left optic rapidly a=
nd runs at Arrow, throwing a left elbow at his face...)

        ----- Orig=
inal Message -----

        To: nbwrpg@yahoo=
groups.com

punch, aiming for Stiller's left eye...

                  Sti=
ller: You better tell your friends not to ruin this. I wanted a fair fight =

                    Burning Hammer stares at Perplex is stasis lock=

ent: Thursday, July 12, 2001 6:08 PM

                                MCGOWAN / BARRYMORE / =
STILLER / ALBA / VIRGO / LEE / DEPP
